title: Update About Us founder portrait asset while keeping existing image path

requirements.summary: Replace the founder portrait image used by the About Us page while keeping the same public asset path so the Founder's Message section displays the new photo without layout changes.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page (Founder's Message section) displays the updated founder picture.
The image continues to load from `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` (no broken image).
No layout regressions occur in the Founder's Message card on mobile or desktop.

file_operations.description: Add the user-provided founder reference photo as a static asset, cropped to a centered 3:4 portrait and exported as JPG at 300x400, using this exact filename so the existing About Us continues to work.
